404.title: Page not found
404.description: Sorry we are not able to find this resource! You could just press this neat little button:

carousel.heading: chatroom network
carousel.slogan:
Talk about your interests.
Get in touch with people in your universe.
Create and animate your own community.

forms.username-error: this username does not meet the constraints.
forms.password-error: this password does not meet the constraints.

title.default: DONUT is made for you to chat about your interests and engage your communities!
title.landing: DONUT - Instant chat about your interests
title.profile: __subtitle__'s profile - DONUT is made for you to chat about your interests and engage your communities!

landing.title: Chat about what you like!
landing.description: On DONUT chat with fun people who share your passions. This is the great return of chat rooms!

description.room: Join me on DONUT.me, the new colorful thematic chat platform. I discuss on __name__ and it would be nice if you join us.
description.user: This is my profile page on DONUT.me, the new colorful thematic chat platform. It would be nice to see you on DONUT.

description.private: This donut is private, for invites only
description.private-invites: This donut is private, for invites only
description.private-invites-group: This donut is private, for members of this community and invites only
description.private-group: This donut is private, for members of this community and invites only
description.public: This donut is public, any user can join

login.passworderror: Your forgot to enter a password

forgot.sent: A e-mail was sent to __email__ with instructions.
forgot.success: Success! Your password was successfully reset.

error.notexists: No account with that email address exists.
error.expired: Please restart the process. This token has expired or has already been used.

signup.disclaimer: By creating an account, I accept EUTC

choose-username.title: It's time to choose a username!
choose-username.description: This username will be your identity on DONUT and will be public. You cannot edit it later.
help: Valid : letters, numbers and special characters: -._
Invalid: spaces, accents and special characters not listed above.
choose-username.usernameerror: This username does not match constraints
choose-username.usernameexists: This username is already taken by someone else.

connect-local.title: Create a password
connect-local.description: Add an-email and a password to your account

edit-email.title: Change your e-mail
edit-email.info: Enter the new e-mail you will use to log in to DONUT:

edit-password.title: Change your password
edit-password.info: Enter a new password and confirm it:

logged.title: Already logged in
logged.text: You are already logged in, enter DONUT:

disclaimer.before: This page is the profile of the donut
disclaimer.after: on the chat platform DONUT.me. On DONUT.me you can join or create a thematic chat room (a donut) about whatever you like. You can chat with people who share your interests.

disclaimer.before: This page is the profile of the user
disclaimer.after: on the chat platform DONUT.me. On DONUT.me you can join or create a thematic chat room (a donut) about whatever you like. You can chat with people who share your interests.

op.is: This user is the moderator of this donut.
op.isgroup: This user is the moderator of this community

deban-group.infobox: Allow again this user to join the community

allowed.success: A request has been sent successfully

message.ban-group-user: You are about to ban user @__username__ from this community
message.deban-group-user: You are about to deban user @__username__ from this community
message.invite: You are about to authorize @__username__. A notification will be sent to invite @__username__ to join #__name__.
message.requestallowance: You are about to request allowance for #__name__. Owner will see your real name and your email on your membership request.
message.requestallowancegroup: You are about to request allowance for #__name__. Owner will see your real name and your email on your membership request.

commands.leave: leave this donut or another one
commands.deop: remove from moderators of this donut
commands.kick: kick out a user from this donut
commands.ban: kick out and ban a user from this donut
commands.unban: unban a user from this donut
commands.block: block private messages from a user
commands.unblock: unblock private messages from a user
commands.unmute: unmute a user of this donut
commands.mute: mute a user of this donut
commands.profile: open a donut or a user profile
commands.me: tell what you are doing or feeling
commands.clear: remove all visible history from interface
commands.random: display a random value (between 1 and 100 by default)

errors.oped: This user is already modérator in this donut
errors.not-op-owner-admin: You do not have permission to do that
errors.commandaccess: You can not use this command here

errors.not-in: This user is not in this donut
errors.owner: This user is the owner of the donut
errors.devoiced: This user is already muted in this donut

users.label: See all users

share.label: share:
share.title: Come to discuss with me in the donut __name__
share.description: Join me on DONUT.me, the new chat platform. I discuss on __name__.

members-invites: This private conversation and its history are only accessible to #__group_name__ community members and users authorized by @__owner__.
invites: This private conversation and its history are only accessible users authorized by @__owner__.
public: This public conversation and its history are accessible to anyone. Share the link with your friends!
private: This is private conversation and its history are only accessible to allowed users.
onetoone: @__username__ isn't online, he will get your messages on his next connection
Post a message to start the conversation.

connection.contactus: Often problems to connect to us?

message.text-spammed: Message tagged as junk by moderator [Show]

blocked.allowed: This donut is private. Only users you authorize can join, participate and access history.
blocked.ask-for-access: To request access, click here.
blocked.password: Or you can join directly if you know the password:
blocked.banned: You were banned from this donut on __at__
blocked.groupbanned: You were banned from this community on __at__
blocked.kicked: You have been kicked out from this donut.
blocked.disclaimer-private: This donut is private. Only users you authorize can join, participate and access history.
blocked.disclaimer-public: This donut is public. Any user can access it.
blocked.disclaimer-password: You have also chosen to put a password. Users with the password can enter without having to be asked first.
blocked.disclaimer-changing: You can switch this donut to private mode. Then, only users you authorize will be able to join, participate and access history. Access will be based on invitation and/or password. The current members of this public donut will remain members once this donut switched to private. Caution, this action cannot be undone.
blocked.disclaimer-group: All members of this community can create a donut in this community and manage it. They can also join private room that allow community members. Public donut of this community can be joined by everyone on the platform.
blocked.allowgroupmember: Allow community members to join this donut

website.label: Website
website.placeholder: URL of a website related to this account

poster.label: Poster
poster.help: The poster is the large vertical image on the right-hand side of the chat thread. Recommended dimensions: 430px width, 975px height.

upload.done: Upload successful, please wait during image rendering

create.label: Create a community
create.help: A community is a place grouping your donut and allowing your community to become a member and access a group of donuts.
create.help-name:
Between 3 and 20 characters, only letters, numbers, dashes (-) and underscores (_).
Caution the community name will no longer be editable.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Describe the community in a few words

visibility.label: Visibility (admin only)

visibility.false: This donut is not displayed on homepage

delete.link: To delete this community click here.
delete.title: Delete
info: You are about to delete this community. This action is immediate and cannot be undone.

mode.password-disclaimer: You can set a password on this donut

disclaimer.group-password: You can also set a password. Users with the password can join this community without prior invitation.

errors.website-size: Website must be 5 characters min. and 255 characters max.

errors.color-hexadecimal: Color must be explained has hexadecimal (e.g.: #FF00AA).
errors.color-integer: Priority must be explained has number (integer).

errors.invalid-password: The password must be 4 and 255 characters

content.ps1: P.S.: To avoid receiving these notification types, please uncheck it from your notification options in your account preferences on
content.ps2: . For any question, we are available on

welcome.subject: Welcome to DONUT.me! Your account was successfully created

content.title: Welcome to DONUT !
content.disclaimer: Congratulations! Your user account was successfully created. Now you can join us and chat around a tasty donut by clicking right here

content.title: Password reset on DONUT.me
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail because you have requested a password reset. Please click on the following link to complete the process
content.info: If you ignore this e-mail your password will remain unchanged

passwordchanged.subject: Success ! Your password has been successfully changed

content.title: Password update
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail as the final confirmation of your password change. Let's go back to DONUT.me and join tasty conversations!

emailchanged.subject: Success ! The e-mail linked to your DONUT.me account has been successfully changed

content.title: Email update
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail because you requested to change the e-mail linked to yout DONUT.me account. It worked perfectly! You can use it to log in:

roomop.subject: You were promoted to moderator in __roomname__

content.title: You were promoted to moderator in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Kudos! You are now a moderator in
content.disclaimer2: It's time to practice your new super powers.

roomdeop.subject: You are no longer a moderator of __roomname__

content.title: You are no longer a moderator of __roomname__
content.disclaimer: This is sad news... But the good news is you will have more time to focus on your very own donut:)

content.title: You were kicked out of __roomname__ by @__username__
content.disclaimer: That can't be a big deal. The two of you just give a big hug and everything will be fine again!

content.title: You were banned from __roomname__ by @__username__
content.disclaimer:
It looks like you were not meant to be together...
But you'll be fine, one lost ten found. Just pick another donut!

roomdeban.subject: You are no longer banned from __roomname__

content.title: You are no longer banned from __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You are no longer banned from
content.disclaimer2: It looks like all is well that ends well!

content.title: You are unmute in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Now can write as much as you want. Enjoy !
content.action: ... and all of that thanks to

content.title: You are mute in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You have been muted in
content.disclaimer4: should unmute you very shortly. Meanwhile pick a donut and join another discussion!
content.action: ... and all of that thanks to

content.title: @__username__ joined __roomname__
content.disclaimer: This is one more! Let's go welcome this marvelous person the right way :).

content.title: @__username__ ask for allowance in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Looks like your donut have great success!

roomallow.subject: An user accept your request to join __roomname__

content.title: @__username__ allow you to join __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You can now enjoy this donut !

roomrefuse.subject: An user refuse your request to join __roomname__

content.title: @__username__ refuse your request to join __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Don't worry you can make another request to join this donut later !

roominvite.subject: An user invites you to join __roomname__

content.title: @__username__ invites you to join __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You can join his room right now!

content.title: @__username__ delete your donut __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Looks like your donut have may has been a problem dot not hesitate to talk with him!

content.title: @__username__ has defined a new topic in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You must a thousand things to say about it!

content.title: @__username__ mentionned you in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: It's always cool to have people thinking about you! Think about replying.

content.title: New private message from @__username__
content.disclaimer: You have a new private message from

content.title: @__username__ ask for allowance in #__groupname__
content.disclaimer: Looks like your donut have great success!

message: DONUT is in pre-launch phase. We tried our best to offer you the friendliest experience but you probably have an idea how to make things even better. Drop us a line on #donut.
Let's get started! Pick a donut and chat with people sharing your interests:
welcome.donotshowagain: Do not show this message again

contactform.title: Contact us
contactform.name: Your name
contactform.sent: Success! Message sent, we'll reply as soon as possible.
contactform.fail: Unable to send email, retry later.

exit.title: Exit confirmation
exit.label-true: Request confirmation before I leave DONUT
exit.label-false: No confirmation when I leave DONUT

welcome.title: Welcome pop-up
welcome.label-true: Display welcome pop-up I log in

sounds.label-true: Play a ringtone when a new message arrives

help.user: DONUT tries to limit smartly the amount of emails and mobile notifications. However if you find that we send too many notifications feel free to send your feedback by email or on #help

nothing.label: Never receive notifications about this donut

channels.title: Notify me on:
channels.desktop-default: Your browser will prompt for approval : approve !
channels.desktop-denied: You have chosen to refuse notifications on your desktop. To modify this choice, you must modify the settings of your browser.
channels.desktop-granted: You have chosen to accept notifications on your desktop. To modify this choice, you must modify the settings of your browser.

events.title: Notify me:
events.infos: Notify me when (only applies to this donut) :

usermessage.label: when a user sends me a private message

roominvite.label: when a user invites me to join a donut

roommessage.label: a user posts a message in this donut

usermention.label: a user mentions me in this donut

roompromote.label: I am promoted, kicked or banned from this donut

roomtopic.label: a user changes the topic of this donut
